channel.title: .onion download for KVM image signature is HTTPS, so connection fails
channel.description:
I can't edit it the link on the page, probably for good reason haha, so I am letting you know here that on this page: dds6qkxpwdeubwucdiaord2xgbbeyds25rbsgr73tbfpqpt4a6vjwsyd.onion/wiki/KVM#Download_Whonix_.E2.84.A2
The PGP signature that is for the .onion KVM image is HTTPS instead of HTTP so it fails download: https :// download.dds6qkxpwdeubwucdiaord2xgbbeyds25rbsgr73tbfpqpt4a6vjwsyd.onion/libvirt/15.0.1.7.2/Whonix-XFCE-15.0.1.7.2.libvirt.xz.asc
Connection establishes just fine though when changed to HTTP :slight_smile:

item.title: .onion download for KVM image signature is HTTPS, so connection fails
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.source: .onion download for KVM image signature is HTTPS, so connection fails

item.title: .onion download for KVM image signature is HTTPS, so connection fails
item.dc:creator: TNT_BOM_BOM
item.description:
Daz:

https :// download.dds6qkxpwdeubwucdiaord2xgbbeyds25rbsgr73tbfpqpt4a6vjwsyd.onion/libvirt/15.0.1.7.2/Whonix-XFCE-15.0.1.7.2.libvirt.xz.asc

Thanks for the report.

cc @Patrick KVM page wrong about having https for onion:

  • OpenPGP Signature (Onion)
  • sha512
  • sha512 OpenPGP
  • sha512 Signify

here:

http://www.dds6qkxpwdeubwucdiaord2xgbbeyds25rbsgr73tbfpqpt4a6vjwsyd.onion/wiki/KVM#Download_Whonix_.E2.84.A2

Read full topic
